Reviews.Title: It works. but ..
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM
Reviews.Content: This phone doesn't run in 3G. I tried to figured but only runs in 2G. I had inserted a 3G chip (working in other phone) but only runs in 2G on this phone. May be the internal configuration had to be changed. It happends with another LG phone that I have (LG E510).

Reviews.Title: Solid and reliable
Reviews.Author: Simon Victor
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and immediately rooted and romed it, so it wouldn't be fair to give a review.However, for the short time I used it as stock, the phone was solid and reliable.I must say that this phone is practically unbrickable and great for experimentation

Reviews.Title: It SUCKS!
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo Simes
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for free from my mobile operator and it sucks. It's freezes frequently, even with a minimum apps added.Tthe "phone function" takes forever to load after it's been on standby for a while...LG SERVICE in SAO PAULO SUCKS... They made me visit their service store 5 times in Sao Paulo and still can't figure out what's wrong with 3G on the phone... It stopped working, they changed the haw are and still doesn't work while my SIM card works smoothly  on any other phone.I recommend that you don't get it... even if it's for free;)
